What Does It Do?
Simple Controls: Tap the screen to make the bird flap its wings and stay airborne. The goal is to guide the bird through gaps between pipes without hitting them. Itâ€™s easy to learn but hard to master! ğŸ‘†ğŸ•¹ï¸

Endless Challenge: The game features endless levels with increasingly difficult gaps between pipes. The further you progress, the tougher it gets, keeping you on your toes! ğŸŒŸğŸ”¥
